name: Alone in the Machine
description:
Stranded, isolated, and running out of air. Can you survive long enough to repair your ship and make it off the island alive?

Controls:

WASD to Move

SHIFT to Sprint

LMB to Shoot

RMB to Melee

F to Interact

TAB for Map

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ectho - Programmer and 3D Artist

Alios - Sound Designer and Composer

Connor H - Level and Environment Designer

SAMED - 3D Modeler

Angle - Assisted with bullet script
